byline.contributor: Anemona Hartocollis contributed reporting from Budapest.

abstract: News Analysis; Germany's power and wealth has thrust it to forefront of Europe's response to migrant crisis, once again compelling it to assume leadership position and shape actions of other countries while struggling to formulate its own; situation has forced Germany to balance it own interests against those of Europe as a whole.
lead_paragraph: As with the Greek debt crisis, Germany once again finds itself compelled or condemned to lead by its wealth and size, and by the lack of leadership elsewhere.

headline.main: Migrant Crisis Gives Germany Familiar Role in Another European Drama
headline.print_headline: Migrant Crisis Gives Germany a Familiar Role in a New Drama

snippet: As with the Greek debt crisis, Germany once again finds itself compelled or condemned to lead by its wealth and size, and by the lack of leadership elsewhere.

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
keywords.name: subject
